channel.title: Easy to do merching video (Not mine)
channel.description: Over the past month or two I have been trying to teach a few people my methods of merching, and lucky for me someone on youtube also uses my method. This is called "flipping" and I think it will help a lot of you to learn about how to find out the buy and sell price for any item. Enjoy guys http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iJeoTNyOa3U&feature=related

item.title: Easy to do merching video (Not mine)
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

cane:

What should yo look for in an item you want to merch?

Stakable, easily obtainable, and oftenly wanted. (not too common, i.e. fire runes)

Read full topic
